item.title: Exception Handling in Asp.Net Core
item.description: Exception handling and giving friendly messages to our users are basics of application development. How can make exception handling in asp.net core? In fact Asp.Net Core template Startup class comes basic structure as below: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 if (env.IsDevelopment()) { app.UseDeveloperExceptionPage(); } else { app.UseExceptionHandler("/Home/Error"); app.UseHsts(); } If our app are working in development environment, we will take detailed information about any throwing exceptions.
